column5: Headed up to sturgeon lake to my dads place this weekend and was wondering if anyone could tell me what the water temps are around. Cheers Jeff
I was on two Kawartha lakes on the weekend and the temps ranged from 44 to 47F.  Sturgeon was one of the lakes I was on. Good luck this weekend!
I'll be on Pigeon in an hour and the conditions are looking excellent
47 to 48 degrees on sunday as well, dont think it will change much
hey lew how did you make out on pigeon?

I trolled for about 4 hours but never hooked up with anything then headed for home around 1:30 or so. Nice day for a boat ride though  Water temps were 46-48 F and there's still LOTS of very green & healthy  weeds.
goose bay should be full of muskie by now chk out around the dead and dying rice beds..some good bass and walleye by accident as well shallow...shallow ...shallow
47 on Upper Buckhorn yesterday...surprised by presence of healthy weeds...couldn't seem to find any musky though.
thanks mer the help. I usually fish from greenhurst/thurstonia up to muskrat island. Hoping to get my first big ski of the year. Post a report when i get back. Cheers jeff
on pigeon today 46.7 to 47.4 bald lake area is about three degree lower. Pictures to follow. Tough conditions

44 on sturgeon today, got out for a couple hours and boated one small muskie, probably around 33-34".  Heavy chop with those winds, made it difficult to cast but got to test my new prop out, 25" tempest plus.....big improvement over the laser II!
